column1: #Text=Katara says : " These yoga stretches can really work wonders if you do them in extreme heat .
#Text=" Aang says : " Like there 's this warm feeling all around me .
#Text=Like I 'm in the Fire Lord 's palace and he 's shooting a bunch of fireballs at me !
#Text=And the whole world is being engulfed in flames !
#Text=" Katara says : " Maybe your stress is the kind you need to talk out .
